message: You can have less, I'll take more!
You can have a bit more, but I'm not giving away all the pie!
You're not getting away with the majority!
Let's find a middle ground, Bob! You're getting closer to the majority, but I'm not giving up yet!
You're running out of time, Alice! I'm taking control!
I'm not giving up yet, Bob! I'll give you a slightly larger share, but I'm not going down without a fight!
You're almost out of time, Alice. Take it or leave it!
I'll give you the majority, Bob, but I'm not going down without a fight! This is my final offer!
